introduction.section1: Traveling to the Land of the Rising Sun means discovering a mix of modernity and tradition. Admire the fascinating changes of scenery depending on the season. Discover bustling cities and neighborhoods.
introduction.section3: We let you find through our articles and our photos, the magic of Japan, for the moment during spring, but we will share more about Japan during autumn and winter soon, so stay tuned.

google-description: Traveling to the Land of the Rising Sun means discovering a mix of modernity and tradition. Admire the fascinating changes of scenery depending on the season. Discover bustling cities and neighborhoods. Follow our city-to-city and season-to-season guide to discover our selection of must-see places. Our travelogue with photos, tips, and advice.
social-network-description: Traveling to the Land of the Rising Sun means discovering a mix of modernity and tradition. Admire the fascinating changes of scenery depending on the season. Discover bustling cities and neighborhoods..

tour.title: Travel around
tour.subtitle: The country from region to region
